metadata.title: CVE-2019-15221 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - negligible
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.1.17. There is a NULLpointer dereference caused by a malicious USB device in thesound/usb/line6/pcm.c driver.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15221` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-lowlatency - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-snapdragon - 5.4.0-9.12
No subscription required
